attributes.action: Address the unfairness towards women in the Pensions Bill – do not speed up the equalisation  with men.
attributes.additional_details:
These women, now in their late 50s, have not had enough time to plan and make provision to manage without the pension they expected all their working lives to get at age 60.   They have already had their pension age revised to an older age without enough notice – do not speed this up even more.

Please sign this petition quickly, so that it can go before Parliament when it reconvenes in the Autumn
